title: “ARE YE ABLE,” SAID THE MASTER
bible_ref: Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of... Matthew 20:20
verses: “Are ye able,” said the Master,=“To be crucified with me?”=“Yea,” the sturdy dreamers answered,=“To the death we follow Thee:”
“Are ye able” to remember,=When a thief lifts up his eyes,=That his pardoned soul is worthy=Of a place in paradise?
“Are ye able?” still the Master=Whispers down eternity,=And heroic spirits answer,=Now, as then in Galilee:
chorus: “Lord, we are able” our spirits are Thine;=Mould them make us like Thee, divine.=Thy guiding radiance above us shall be=A beacon to God, to love and loyalty
